title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; stream chats or pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j – Java Client
summary: Lightweight Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Template repo showing RAG with Ollama + LangChain + Chroma in 30 lines.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chat interface for Ollama with markdown, code highlight, memory.

title: ollama-cli – Rust TUI
summary: Fast Rust TUI for chatting, pulling, and managing Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama-powered inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust – Rust SDK
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; chat, pull, delete, list models with tokio.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET Client
summary: Community-maintained C# client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and streaming chat.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers questions using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models inside your vault.

title: ollama-rag-streamlit
summary: Streamlit demo app for document Q&A powered by Ollama embeddings and Chroma.

title: r/ollama – Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips, integrations and troubleshooting Ollama.
